name: BaselineFrameGridRelativeOption
shortdesc: The starting point used to calculate the baseline frame grid offset.

property.name: TOP_OF_PAGE
property.shortdesc: Offsets the grid from the top of the page.

property.name: TOP_OF_MARGIN
property.shortdesc: Offsets the grid from the top margin of the page.

property.name: TOP_OF_FRAME
property.shortdesc: Offsets the grid from the top of the text frame.

property.name: TOP_OF_INSET
property.shortdesc: Offsets the grid from the top inset of the text frame.
